&#3935;&#3962;&#3938;: say; ray; beam; shaft of light

[2469] 1.'od kyi zer mdangs/ ... 'od zer/ ... nyi zer/ ... chu zer/ ... tsha zer/ ... 2.mi 'dod pa dang/ ma rangs pa'i tshig shugs ston byed phrad cig  ... chos thams cad rang ngos nas bden par grub zer/ ... de skad zer/ ... skabs der 'jig rten pa rnams zhing la so nam byed pa'i srol dar zhing/ bsod nams kyi mthu las dngul zangs lcags gsum yang thon zer/ ...
say, rays, so they say, shaft of light, talk, a small animal, to say, to be called, direct speech particle, which is called

1) light rays; 2) is being said, say; 3) talk; 4) call, address; 5) weasel). 1) light rays; 2) is being said, which would then [wrongly] say [mi 'dod pa dang, ma rangs pa'i tshig shugs ston byed phrad cig //chos thams cad rang ngos nas bden par grub zer,//de skad zer,//skabs der 'jig rten pa rnams zhing la so nam byed pa'i srol dar zhing, bsod nams kyi mthu las dngul zangs lcags gsum yang thon zer. 1) light rays; 2) is being said, which would then [wrongly] say [R]; 3) talk; 4) weasel)
1) is being said; 2) rays (of light) {'od zer}. declared. say, said; {zer ba}
